name: rrhcne
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, crrext), wcel(cfv(crrh, c0), co(c1, ccn, c2)))

stmt.origin: rrhcn(c0, c1, c2, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(czlm, c0), wcel(c0, crrext))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, crrext), wcel(cfv(crrh, c0), co(c1, ccn, c2)))
-| wceq(cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))), cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))))

body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ RRExt →(RRHom ` c0)∈(c1[Cn]c2))
⊣ ((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0)))=((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0)))
⊣ c1 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
⊣ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ (ZMod ` c0)=(ZMod ` c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ RRExt → c0 ∈ DivRing)
⊣ (c0 ∈ RRExt → c0 ∈ NrmRing)

⊣ (c0 ∈ RRExt → c0 ∈ CUnifSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ RRExt →(UnifSt ` c0)=(metUnif `((dist ` c0)|`((Base ` c0)×(Base ` c0)))))
